huji.ac.il.stick_defence

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • huji.ac.il.stick_defence.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoProtocolAction, java.io.Serializable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements DoProtocolAction, java.io.Serializable
    A client for managing all the communication with the server. It uses the singleton pattern so that it will be accessible from all the different activities.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setServer

        public void setServer(java.net.Socket server)
        Set the server the client is currently connected too. The server could be changed during the game if needed so.
        Parameters:
        server - the current server
